name: SetDataDrivenTestDataSourceTableNames
friendlyName: Set Data-driven Test Data Source Table Names
description: Sets the configuration-backed data source table names for data driven tests. Useful for configuring data-driven tests for different environments.
author: Alex Marshall

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in the file system on the build agent to the .config File containing the dataSources to be configured.

inputs.name: dataTableName
inputs.label: Data Table Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the table in each of the data sources to be used for executing data driven tests
